overview:
Tim Sheehan was the CEO of 7 Degrees. Previoulsy, Tim ran Yahoo! Finance and grew it into the most popular finance site on the Internet and a significant earnings contributor for Yahoo!.

Tim was consistently named one of the top executives in e-finance by Institutional Investor magazine, and Yahoo! Finance won many awards including several Webby Awards for best finance site. After leading Yahoo! Finance, Tim led My Yahoo!, Yahoo! Broadbandâ€™s web efforts including the AT&T / Yahoo! co-branded web products, Yahoo! Alerts, and Yahoo! Toolbar.

Prior to Yahoo!, Tim led a product management team for ETrade which won a Wired Award for best finance site. Prior to ETrade, Tim was a Senior Producer for ESPN.com. Most recently, Tim was Co-Founder and VP of Products for Attributor and prior to Attributor he led the turnaround of Yodlee as its SVP & General Manager.

Tim has earned a Master of Science in Information Management from Marymount University.
